author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Can you add
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
to your project file and retrigger the bot?

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/chualynn/Theta.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- f051fd60-7d33-11e9-89fe-4bce8b4f4b90 -->
